title: Turn of the century
creator_credit: William Weintraub and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A glance at Canada’s yesteryears, at people and events, fashions and foibles at the end of the 19th century and the beginning of the 20th. From old photos and fragments of silent movies, this film pieces together a lively chronicle of what our elders like to call “the good old days.”
